<h3 style="margin-top:5;margin-bottom:5;">Details</h3>
<p align="justify">
This dataset is a 300-m aggregated of the 30-m resolution dataset on sub-pixel proportions of bare land derived by Hansen et al. (2013). This dataset is a bi-product of the Global Forest Change (GFC) dataset.
</p>

<h3 style="margin-top:5;margin-bottom:5;">Subdatasets</h3>
<details style='cursor:pointer;border:none;box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05) 0px 6px 24px 0px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08) 0px 0px 0px 1px;padding:10px;margin:0;'>
<summary style="font-size:16px;">`percentCover`<span style="color:#C8C8C8;"> | </span>Per-pixel densities of bare land (%)</summary>
<hr style="margin-top:0;margin-bottom:20px;">
|content|description|
|-------|-----------|
|value_range|0...100|
</details>
<h3 style="margin-top:5;margin-bottom:5;">masDMT query</h3>
<div style="width=80%;margin-top:5;margin-bottom:5;background-color:#777777;">
```{r eval=FALSE, echo=TRUE}
# data call without specifying subdataset and resolution
list_data("GBL")

# data call for specific subdataset 
list_data("GBL/percentCover")

# data call to subdataset with a specific resolution
list_data("GBL/percentCover/300m")
```
</div>
